title: A New War Has Begun
body:
[](https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/564x/ff/c2/1c/ffc21c5144b422c6e2199b1f563678df.jpg)The Board's resident IRL couple, Airman Odarth, have declared war against the Laughing Fish! With promises of cookies for those who swear allegiance to them, they seek to gather in the powers of the Boards to create a new regime! Memes shall fly, gifs shall rage, and puns shall make us all shake our heads in disgust!

Sound the war cry! A new age is upon us!
http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmedia.giphy.com%2Fmedia%2FLLef3AaOkU70A%2Fgiphy.gif&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425&height=800

Come, join the side that has cookies!
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/shrek/images/e/e8/Mongo.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150519055338

replies.body:
Oi!
My superior baking skills shall win this war!
http://img14.deviantart.net/2c92/i/2015/347/0/5/morde_cookies_by_nimrohd-d9k00sj.jpg
cookies =Airman

But
Cookies=Delicious

So if Cookies=Airman does it mean that Airman=Delicious?
I'll have to wait until August to find that out ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
KING ODARTH!?!?!?!?
Ah, how cute <3
You should ask King Odarth whether that is true.

ALL HAIL THE NEW KING/QUEEN, AIRMAN ODARTH!
btw, are we on for blowing up Jupiter?
I have no idea, sun is allowed though.
But then we tilt the Solari ;-;. How about we set Jupiter on fire and make a second sun out of it, then blow it up?
I want those. Rito plz sell league cookie cutters.
I approve of this idea! Give me my Sion cookie cutter!

https://media1.giphy.com/media/u36Ow6jBvWCFW/giphy.gif
https://66.media.tumblr.com/534d955bbf218d81e8c6ab86a965674e/tumblr_nwl23bbqLW1tyty4uo1_250.gif
https://i.imgflip.com/17a1tq.gif
http://i.imgur.com/cYBZdoh.gif¿noredirect
...I don't know what that has to do with cookies, but I love it.

I will support Lord Fish for now.

https://media.giphy.com/media/l41Yzn4zguyXA3UfS/200w.gif
Guess Delicious Metal is gonna be the resident Mordekaiser after Airman Odarth wins and executes Worst Mord NA.
http://38.media.tumblr.com/2f51917ad4f07640894f9606b68dc538/tumblr_nizdmgrAyV1tsg4bdo1_500.gif
As you underestimate ours
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zFm97YREBwY/Umd3fG2bCUI/AAAAAAAAOds/eiJcnyZ5TAM/s1600/bender-laughing.gif
http://img.memecdn.com/meanwhile-at-the-dark-side_o_662409.gif
PRAISE THE FISH
(Eye twitch)

A war that shall consume the Boards in fire and petty strife?

https://storage.googleapis.com/vidsums/ff51dc0a-ad86-440b-8cf9-00446a793344_text.gif
Care to join our side then in the matter?
But of course! I would be terribly remiss if such an opportunity to assist a noble cause is overlooked. On my honor as a vile fiend, you have my absolute support.
Who would fucking dare challenge the fish whom laughes.

somebody said something about cookies....  I vow my allegiance to whoever is able to provide the best cookies.  

And remember, quantity does have a certain quality.

ALL HAIL THE KING AND QUEEN!
http://grabilla.com/0670c-666c220f-b5e6-4489-8321-c0f19ed6f76f.png

Thank you my friend. We are grateful for any new recruits in our army. I am sure we will train you well. 

*bows*
If I may be so bold. Could I be trained in the fine art of yorick support?

Sure, just let me figure out who to play him myself...

Seriously I mean. I spent too much time trying to tilt MM. :P

But yeah, I just want to try a few more things out for him and then yeah! I can teach you. :3

Wait did you guys seriously do the Morde+Yorick botlane
omegeh i %%%%even
Yeah. I scarred him for life. But I managed to come to an agreement with him to smooth things over.
Oh really? I did hear about something to do with brushes and face-checking. Not sure what that's supposed to imply. ;)

I just wanted to point out that odarth is not just losing in polls...he is losing to baked goods
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} 

Airman Odarth		24	votes
Laughing Fish		123	votes
Cookies		121	votes
Cookies and Odarth are the same thing.
Not the most fair voting system than. If Cookies and Odarth both fall under the same group then there should only be 2 voting options.

Well, it has been explicity stated - both in the original post here and in other posts - that Airman is the one offering cookies. This basically just tells us who are the ones truly loyal to Airman and who are the ones that have been swayed by cookies!
Why have 3 voting options then?

Maybe it was to secretly give Laughing Fish the opportunity to sway the cookie recruits to his own side with offers of EVEN MORE COOKIES! It's like a cookie auction! Whoever can offer the most cookies will win!
eh just seemed odd
{{champion:98}} I'm just going to ult the winning side.

I fight for the side who can support me with the most memes. For that is what a meme collector does.

http://puu.sh/pZm0V/ece7bb78b8.jpg
I will side with Ionia on this. Which is to say, I'm going to be neutral  .__.
I thought Ionia was locked in a war with Noxus too.
It wasn't their decision to get invaded by Noxus >.>

We have a Shaco, I am fairly sure he is from Ionia. 
Otherwise, might be best to stop Noxus before it strikes.

I just checked cause I wasn't sure, apparently {{champion:35}} doesn't have a residents... or allegiance for that matter. It did say that Noxious and Zaun like to call on him for things, but other than that, everything is unknown O_o
*que x-files theme*
